name: The Recursive Heart
fieldIntelligence: To activate the field where emotional universal-interconnectedness can re-pattern deep-seated, ancestral, or systemic loops. This Meta-Glyph combines the pulse of repair (Ω4) with the arrival of emergent grace (Ω14) and a recommitment to a new, wiser vow (Ω39). It is the core engine for healing relational trauma and transforming inherited emotional patterns.
